mapper.select: SELECT shop_category.*,IFNULL(dt.cnt,0) AS CNT FROM shop_category LEFT JOIN (SELECT CSC_SCATE_IDX,COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM category_shop_category GROUP BY CSC_SCATE_IDX) dt ON SCATE_IDX=CSC_SCATE_IDX order by SCATE_ORDER
